body.Query:
let fileHash = "@{items('Comment_IoC_All_Detected_Devices')?['Value']}";
find in (DeviceFileEvents, DeviceProcessEvents, DeviceEvents, DeviceRegistryEvents, DeviceNetworkEvents, DeviceImageLoadEvents)
where SHA1 == fileHash or InitiatingProcessSHA1 == fileHash
project DeviceName, ActionType, FileName, InitiatingProcessFileName, Timestamp, SHA1, InitiatingProcessSHA1
| project DeviceName, Timestamp

let fileHash = "@{items('For_each')?['Value']}";
find in (DeviceFileEvents, DeviceProcessEvents, DeviceEvents, DeviceRegistryEvents, DeviceNetworkEvents, DeviceImageLoadEvents)
where SHA1 == fileHash or InitiatingProcessSHA1 == fileHash
| project DeviceName, Timestamp, DeviceId

body.message:
MDATP Results:

The hash values were detected on the following devices (Device name, Device ID):

@{variables('MDATPVulnDev')}

Virus Total Results of the hash value (Total positive detection, Total AV Scan):

@{variables('VTPositive')} / @{variables('VTTotal')}
